text: (obage) bharyayavanva oba (rajayi vana) talak pavasa ovun tama (gæb gænima dæna ganna kalaya vana iddavehi) pramada kalayehi sitiyahot (ema pramada kalaya avasan vimata pera) ovunva niyamita andamata (bharyayan vasayenma) randava taba ganu. nætahot (iddave pramada kalaya avasan karagena) niyamita andamin (ovun nidahas vimata) athæra damanu. namut oba asadharanaye vedana kirima sandaha ovunva valakva notabanu. me andamata kavurun ho kalahot niyata vasayenma ohu tamanta tamanma haniyak kara gatteku vanneya. ebævin oba allahge ayavan, (ayavanhi pavasana lada karanavan) samaccalayata lak kara noganu. oba kerehi allah laba di æti varaprasadayanda, oba kerehi ohu pahala karana lada dharmayada, gnanayada sita (paryesanaya kara) balanu. ohu memagin obata ovadan denneya. allahta biya vanu. niyata vasayenma allah siyalla hondin danneya yannada sthira vasayen dæna ganu
